```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(readr)
library(here)
library(kableExtra)
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
schedule <- read_csv(here::here('schedule.csv'))
# Define the start and end dates for class day 1 and 2
# (e.g. 1 is Monday, 2 is Wednesday)
start1 <- as.Date("2019/08/26")
end1   <- as.Date("2019/12/02")
start2 <- as.Date("2019/08/28")
end2   <- as.Date("2019/12/04")
# Set date for reading day and first day of finals 
reading <- as.Date("2019/12/09")
finals  <- as.Date("2019/12/12")
# Format the dates
date1 <- format(seq(start1, end1, by = "week"), format="%m/%d")
date2 <- format(seq(start2, end2, by = "week"), format="%m/%d")
dates <- paste(date1, date2, sep=' &<br>')
dates <- c(dates, format(c(reading, finals), format="%m/%d"))
# Make the schedule data frame
schedule$Dates <- dates
# Define the week 
schedule$Week <- seq(1:length(dates))
schedule <- schedule[c('Week', 'Dates', 'Event/Topics', 'Quizzes/Homeworks/Practice')]
# Render the schedule as markdown
kable(schedule, format='markdown')
```
